thread.title: Winter Olympics kick off with historic Korean gesture

title: Winter Olympics kick off with historic Korean gesture
text:
Winter Olympics kick off with historic Korean gesture 1:14am IST - 02:00 
Politics may have overshadowed the pageantry of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics' opening ceremony, as South Korea's president was joined by Kim Jong-un's sister, the first person from the North's ruling family to visit that country. Reuters reporter Grace Lee has more from the games.

Reuters reporter Grace Lee has more from the games.  //reut.rs/2sifFST
